intro.title: Welcome {{displayName}} to Jahia 8
intro.defaultMessage: Find links and resources we think will be useful for you in this page: quick access to the projects you can contribute to and links to documentation and tutorials
intro.developmentMessage: Find useful links and resources here including quick access to the projects and modules you contribute to, and links to documentation and tutorials

createNew.title: Create new
createNew.description: Create new / Go to the administration to create a new project

modules.title: Modules
modules.noModules: You have no modules at the moment. You can create them in studio.

studio.title: Studio
studio.description: Use the studio to build modules from the ground up, from custom components definition to template design.

graphiql.title: GraphiQL
graphiql.description: Use GraphiQL to explore the current GraphQL schema, as well to build and execute GraphQL queries.

sdlgenerator.title: SDL Generator
sdlgenerator.description: Use the SDL Generator to help you create the SDL file corresponding to your needs.

sdlreport.title: SDL Report
sdlreport.description: Use the SDL Report to troubleshoot your SDL issues

jwt.title: JWT Tokens
jwt.description: Use this to create a JWT token you can use in your application
